alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 23 at 1:44AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR OAHU THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Oahu. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Several rounds of slow-moving heavy showers and thunderstorms will move over Oahu from the south today, bringing periods of heavy rainfall to both leeward and windward communities.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Waianae Mountains
